website_summaries.verdict: Great for occasional small welding jobs. Professionals and DIY-ers alike are happy with its price point, portability, and performance.
pros: Handles 1/8-inch plate metal welding with ease
Very good starter MIG welder, as well as for do-it-yourselfers and hobbyists, owners note
Settings are easy to dial in
cons: Reports of problems operating welder on arrival
A few reports of unit overheating quickly
Some users don’t like the quality of the included wire

customer_reviews.title: Great welder at a great price - perfect for hobbyist builds like RC Mower
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a great price point. I'm a first time welder with no experience, and I was able to start joining angle iron and square tubing in no time. Welder has been super useful for hobbyist type welds, and occasional automotive fixes. My crowning achievement so far was an RC Lawn Mower I was able to build - thanks to this welder! I recommend getting 'Tip Dip' nozzle gel, I've done tons of welds on the first tip and at this rate, will never have to replace it. Get this one, skip the cheaper welders on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lebo

customer_reviews.title: The Forney Easy Weld 299 125 FC welder is great for a ...
customer_reviews.text: The Forney Easy Weld 299 125 FC welder is great for a beginner who does not anticipate going beyond 3/16" in thickness. In destructive testing, I was able to fully bend 1/8" think steel without welds breaking, however, when stepping up to 1/4" (above max recommended) the welds broke out before the metal would bend. The arc, compared to a major brand with red case, is very comparable. The only con I can think of is the included sample wire, ditch it in favor of something higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: demlockian

customer_reviews.title: Bought this welder to complete a trailer project. Layed ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this welder to complete a trailer project. Layed down my very first weld with his machine so i am clearly no expert, but as you see from the pictures even a complete beginner can unbox this machine and follow the chart for he material you are welding and lay down an effective weld.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn S. Hoyt Jr.

customer_reviews.title: but it works amazing for small odd jobs
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for a heavy duty welder this isn't it, but it works amazing for small odd jobs. Easy to use and light weight for a welder of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Abs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent welder, Great Value, and Great But
customer_reviews.text: Upon receiving this welder I was a little skeptical at first, after opening it up and trying it out I was very very pleased with the results. It will weld 1/4” steel. Remember prepping is everything. Beveling the corners and having clean steel it will weld very nice welds. Both the connections are 6’ long. Power cord unfortunately is relatively short and located on the front the welder as well. It weld both 0.030 and 0.035 wire with no problems. That being said I don’t recommend using the wire that comes with it. All and all I would not only recommend this welder but I would gladly buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

customer_reviews.title: didnt work, wire feed motor was dead on arrival ...
customer_reviews.text: didnt work, wire feed motor was dead on arrival. returned the next day. customer service never returned the call either.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: she runs just fine in my shop for small welds and tacks
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended. The feed and thickness need to be played with as you go or you are going to end up with splatter everywhere. My only worry is that toward the end of the 2 min duty run it tends to splatter a lot more and the feed needs to be adjusted again. Beyond that complaint, she runs just fine in my shop for small welds and tacks.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Cables too short.
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this machine for around six months now. You will find the welding wire that comes with the machine will get used up pretty quick. - You will need to order a full size spool when you buy your machine. I'm not a welder and its good to practice on some scrap metal of different thickness first. I think the ground cable and the welding "gun" cable are about three feet too short. Also, the power cable should be designed to come out of the other end of the machine....... it seems that the cables are forever getting tangled up. On the whole it works fine and I have used it on simple repairs and the like.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra couple bucks.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. I figured I get some use out of it before writing a review. Bought it to weld outside as my good welder uses gas. I just used to repair a jeep frame. I ground down to clean metal. It welded very smoothly. If you've never welded before you could learn on this one.
customer_reviews.author: don triebel

customer_reviews.title: Makes me look like I know what I'm doing
customer_reviews.text: Great machine... I'm not a welder but this machine makes me look like I am. Well, the machine and the hood and welding gloves combination makes me look like I am. So much so that I'm getting one for my warehouse too... for 200 bucks you cant go wrong with this machine... Love that it can take the larger spools so I can save a bit of money to pay a real welder to do the critical work :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up,easy to use, more than enough power.  Well worth the few extra dollars.  Research, then buy this unit.
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned so often, very happy I bought this unit over a bare bones minimum unit. I did a few hours of research. The safety features alone make it worth the few extra dollars. The machine was easy to set up, easy to use. More than enough power. I have never used a MIG welder before. Watched the YouTube videos. Seemed very natural and easy to use. My first home improvement project savings alone, will more than pay for the unit. Looking forward to more projects MIG welding. This machine is a great value. Quality. Ease of use. Performance . Safety. Cost
customer_reviews.author: Bill in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Still Making A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased my second Forney. The first one along with a nice buzz box welder I had to give to my brother when he gave me an expensive gift - such is life. I've been using a Hobart Handler running flux core wire for most of my projects with pretty good results, but even given Hobarts excellent quality, I've always missed my Forney welder, which also gave me excellent results (I'm a hobbyist/DIYer) at a fraction of the cost, and using anti spatter spray any difference that I can tell is negligible. If you're not working with thick metal, this is a pretty good machine and excellent for the money - maybe the best in it's price category.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Inverter Technology makes this DC welder very portable. Only goes to 90 amps but I use only 3/32 rod and that's more than enough. Was using wire welder for lighter material but this is the ticket for thicker material and laying down a heavier weld and filling in. Took some getting used to pushing down rod as oposed to pulling trigger on wire welder. More economical than wire welder. 2 lbs. of flux core wire for 15~20 bucks and 13~14 dollars for 5 lbs. of 6013 rod.
customer_reviews.author: Roger F Arrowood

customer_reviews.title: The unit I received does not feed wire on the high power setting
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received does not feed wire on the high power setting. Useless to me. Would be nice if some customer support was available to troubleshoot but it appears return/exchange is the only option. If new unit works I will change my rating.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive alternative to the Blue machine
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my son and he tells me he loves it. Previously he was using my Miller with the shielding gas but says this one works just as well without the need for the extra accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff G.

customer_reviews.title: Great welder!!
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t know how to weld and I’m still a beginner, I have no experience but I can tell you that this welder is really easy to use, I have used the welder for small projects and I have had really good results, now I didn’t do much research before I bought it so I’ll recommend you to decide before you buy it if you prefer MIG or Flux core same brand different welders, but I’ll definitely will recomed this welder for DIY guys and beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Luis

customer_reviews.title: Pass this one up, save yourself the hassle
customer_reviews.text: I had this thing for about 10 months and it decided to stop working, the mechanism that pushes the wire out stopped working, I used it sparingly here and there for little projects around the house, arc is very unstable and the penetration sucks, this thing struggles on anything over 1/16 I know it's only rated to weld up to 1/8th honestly I didn't expect much for the price range but save yourself the hassle and save up a little extra and get the entry level titanium 125 from HF if this is your price range, difference is like night and day
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every hobbyist garage should have one
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Friends all tried to sway me away from a cheap welder. I literally just wanted something for doing small jobs like tacking exhaust together or laying enough bead to hold together, or to build little cobbled custom tools for misc jobs. So far has worked great and I've only been using it for minor exhaust work
customer_reviews.author: Androo

customer_reviews.title: An awesome welder, for a beginner
customer_reviews.text: An awesome welder, for a beginner. I never welded at all, before trying this. I was able to weld, the very first time using this machine...not pretty welds, by any description, but solid, serviceable welds. If you need pretty welds, buy an angle grinder, too...
customer_reviews.author: Edward G. Morris

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for cheap welder = crappy welds
customer_reviews.text: Welder looks very nice really thought it was going to perform as I have read so many great reviews but it is quite opposite for me you cannot adjust amperage it seems to think it know how much amperage is sufficient for certain wirespeed very dissatisfied really bummed was really looking forward to knocking out so projects this weekend but as agian you get what you pay for cheap does mean good or even functional for that matter
customer_reviews.author: dormandieselandauto

customer_reviews.title: Very handy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how you can beat this little welder. It's great for beginners and someone that knows what they are doing. Forney is a very nice brand of welders. It's not too heavy which is surprising and if you send in the paperwork they give you a warranty with it. I think this welder is definitely worth the price. Very handy on a ranch or farm.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Output
customer_reviews.text: I did not find the output (AC or DC) in the online description; I was seeking DC, and returned the unit without even plugging it in or removing it from the carton.
customer_reviews.author: ID Mountain Dude

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I’m no expert and this is my first welder. After reading more than a few reviews, I settled on this brand. For as much as I’m going to use it, it works great. Took a few days of trial and error (no fault of the welder itself) and a few more days of tweaking the wire speed and I’m happy with the results. I have a few more metal projects I can do now.
customer_reviews.author: LWinfield3

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I only had a cheapo stick welder before ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I only had a cheapo stick welder before and could never get a consistent bead, but this thing makes it easy. Should have got one 15 years ago. Held back 5th star because this one costs more than others in its apparent class. Arrived intact, setup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Great to learn on!
customer_reviews.text: This pic is of my first welds ever in my life, by the 9th try I was really close, nice machine
customer_reviews.author: Mark Littleton

customer_reviews.title: Makes a AWESOME paperweight and or Butt Seat
customer_reviews.text: Used this P.O.S maybe 8 times over a 2year period Wire feed motor died. Now I use it as a butt seat in my house
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Liked it until the ground clamp fell off. I didnt want to crimp it back on so I returned it for their stick/tig variant. It does the job if you want the flux core wire. I like that the sticks are cheaper than paying for another wire wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use. 3 switches power, feed and temp. that is it. go by the instructions and you will have no problem. this is perfect for those novice that dont even know anything about welding. this machine makes it easier and gives you the confidence to weld. i will not ever give this away. its not all that small and light but it works perfectly. i have welded my own bracket seats and a work roller bench together. wish i had pics to show.
customer_reviews.author: Raiden

customer_reviews.title: good for the price
customer_reviews.text: so far it works not sure about the it being able to weld 1/4 steel maybe 3/16 but for what I used it for worked ok. I have some lighter projects around the house here I will update later. But I think for the price and for use it will work just fine
customer_reviews.author: rysin

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work out of the box. I contacted Forney and they have discontinued this item, therefore there is nothing they can do. Poor customer service, with no resolution. I do not recommend this item. I would not have any faith in Forney’s customer service based on my experience. Overall, listen to the 1-star reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Jewell

customer_reviews.title: It's a good welder for small projects and repairs.
customer_reviews.text: Love this welder. Like it better than my Lincoln weld pack hd. It's perfect for small projects and repairs around my property. Very happy with it as I've probably got a full 20hrs of actual weld time on it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Dk

customer_reviews.title: Handy welder
customer_reviews.text: Handy welder for making repairs, don't have to worry about having a bottle of shielding gas. Just plug it in and you are ready to get to work. I like tig welders but for the price this is great for repairs and small fabrication projects
customer_reviews.author: steven hall

customer_reviews.title: Great first welder
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a professional welder, I bought the machine to teach myself and become comfortable with welding. So far it was easy to set up, has clear instructions and guides (it's worth it to look up Forney Industries on YouTube for their tips and tricks to make using their product easier to use). It's durable and is up to the challenge of a home shop.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Denzer

customer_reviews.title: it's not good
customer_reviews.text: the only welding wire for thick irons that works is the one that comes from the factory machine and I can't get it on amazon or on the internet ... I'm really very unhappy with the product
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: You need a DC negative welder not this AC welder
customer_reviews.text: Its an AC welder. To weld flux core right you need DC negative. You can't get good penetration on anything over 1/8 with this unit. With AC the electric flow is only going the right direction 50% of the time. The AC flow changes direction 60 times a second. It causes a lot more spattering and a colder weld.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Farm work like welding a silo together for grain
customer_reviews.text: I will not lie I was pissed when I set it up. The feeder wasn't worko ng right and the wire kept popping off the track. When I fixed it I started welding ofcourse. I didn't think much of it, then I turned the feed rate up n found my g spot. If you want a little welder for home use such as building bumpers for your car. Farm work like welding a silo together for grain, adding reinforcement to you 1 ton trailer. This thing is awesome. It isn't a Miller or a newer Hobart. But for 170 plus or less it's a really really good welder. I have 0 issues with it as of right now.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: but in the end it seems to work great..
customer_reviews.text: Took some adjusting as I'm an amateur ....but in the end it seems to work great.....but you have to practice... Eventually ran some great beads after an hour of messing around......and welded some 1/8 flat bar just fine.....Over all would buy again....great price. In reading all reviews I guess you just can't please everyone.
customer_reviews.author: David M. Little

customer_reviews.title: Works great but...
customer_reviews.text: First of all I have to say that this welder works great... but remember this a budget 120volt mig. I used this to fix some broken welds on my snow blower. It Did a great job. ***Beware of the plastic hinges that attach the side door to the base of the welder. Convenient design, horrible plastic cheap hinges. First time I used it. I went to load the machine door flopped Down and both hinges snapped off. 24 degrees outside but still. Otherwise buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is an easy welder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this welder!! Will weld exhaust with ease. No issues out of the box. I have no prior welding experience and I was able to use this. Flux core does spatter a lot so would recommend an open work space and welding gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F.

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level welder
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. I’m a novice but I’ve been around welding all my life. Setup was easy, just load your wire and go. I was having no trouble laying straight beads after a few adjustments. Great value for the money. I just with the cord and the gun leads were longer.
customer_reviews.author: Justin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder
customer_reviews.text: This thing works like a champ! Instead of dragging out the big welder to do a small task, this is the perfect solution,
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with no experience.
customer_reviews.text: This welder is awesome, I had a harbor freight stick welder and it sucked so bad that it pushed me to buy this. It's Flux core so no gas needed which is great. I have no experience mig welding and I have gotten pretty good with this in less than a week. It's like a hot glue gun for steel.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Great little welder for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great little welder for the price, works great on 1/8 inch metal through sheetmetal. I haven't tried it on 1/4 inch yet, I use it mostly on exhaust pipe.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good home welder
customer_reviews.text: This is a good, light-duty, home welder. It's a bit sensitive when the wire is fed - the feed tube has to be kept pretty straight or the wire won't feed when welding.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: I really like this little welder
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little welder, I have welded in a shop and used high end welders before, I needed something for home to do some body work on a vehicle and other projects, does sheet metal great, and also heavier steel! I am very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: GOOD WELDER!
customer_reviews.text: Great beginner welder. I use it for small projects all the time and its easy to use. One thing that is kinda annoying is the power cord is only 6 feet long so i had to buy a 12 gauge 25 foot extension cord from lowes so I could use it on my truck in my driveway. But other then that it works great and I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Will S.

customer_reviews.title: Novice welder
customer_reviews.text: Had a couple of repairs to make and tired of borrowing - works well and easy to operate. Probably won't wear out in my life time but this product is well made and will be passed on for sons to use.
customer_reviews.author: john marshall

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is a real nice welder for the home shop and do it yourselfer. Easy to use and to set up. Recommended settings by the manufacturer are pretty close but can be improved with a little tweeking. All in all I am satisfied with this welder.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burns

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners will small projects.
customer_reviews.text: Must prep the wielding area very well before wielding and covering to stop splatter outside wield area. Makes great wields on thin stuff. Must clean well between passes.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. As I always wanted a 120volt mig welder, I was always looking at the top brands and found I couldn't afford them. For a gasless welder, this works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Treva Dibble

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Not for heavy duty work, but great for those small projects that I have around the house.
customer_reviews.author: O. Torres

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I'm a novice welder starting out so this welder is perfect for me. Easy to use and seems to work well. I'm sure it will work even better as my technique improves
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great Welder!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Welder!!! I have been welding for 9 years out of school and this little welder is perfect for what its meant for. Forney's customer's service is amazing as well, I had to replace my wire speed controller because I broke it, and they over nighted me another one the next day. Overall this is a great portable hobby welder!
customer_reviews.author: Barry Moodie

customer_reviews.title: Great welder, careful with the door
customer_reviews.text: This welder is working great so far, and the only complaint i have is that i broke the door off accidentally. I would normally blame myself, but i was simply tilting the welder to check out the instructions inside and lightly bumped the door and the hinges broke. Would prefer they be metal but hey for the price its pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Great welder for the money
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't expecting much out of a cracker box welder but after using on a few different projects now, I am comfortable saying this welder is the best thing since sliced bread.
customer_reviews.author: Canon L.

customer_reviews.title: I love my welder!
customer_reviews.text: For the price there just isn't a better welder out there. No it doesn't have all the bells and whistles that the more expensive welders have but for the hobbyist this thing rocks!
customer_reviews.author: ieatcaribou

customer_reviews.title: Good Bang for the Buck
customer_reviews.text: I'm not professional welder. Just need to weld somethings time to time and this welder meets those needs. Easy to work with and lives up to it's name Easy Weld
customer_reviews.author: The Ride

customer_reviews.title: IT CAME PERFECT, I LIKE IT VERY MUCH
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE MY NEW WELDING MACHINE, I AM NEW IN WELDING NOT TOO MUCH EXPERIENCE I TRIED WITH THE STICK MACHINE AND IT WAS HARD BUT WITH THIS ITS easier. I USE IT YESTERDAY TO FIX A FENCE AND IT WORKED GREAT FOR ME
customer_reviews.author: TITO TRIMARCHI

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: I used it when it arrived and was good. Today i needed it for a riding lawn mower deck and its dead. It's been on a cart all that time, and go figure I can't return it. DO NOT BUY If I could return it I would be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes welding so easy, even a 10yr old can do it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this machine to teach my daughter how to weld. Works great. She is super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am a self taught welder and needed a welder for home projects. This welder has worked very well for my needs. As long as it is set up properly it works great.
customer_reviews.author: polaris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I personally wouldn't use this for any bigger than 1/8
customer_reviews.author: Ladiebugs

customer_reviews.title: Meets All My Needs and at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: OK I'm not a welder just a guy that occasionally needs to stick two pieces of metal together. This welder has been working great for me. Have used it to repair several pieces of farm equipment, motorcycle kick stand, etc. Have not had any issues. Easy to set-up, easy to adjust and easy to put away.
customer_reviews.author: CLARK M.

customer_reviews.title: Great flux core wire feed welder.
customer_reviews.text: Great flux core wire feed welder. I did a bunch of welding and it didn't overheat like the harbor freight one it replaced...
customer_reviews.author: brenton Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was junk at first. Took me a ...
customer_reviews.text: Thought it was junk at first. Took me a bit to get it dialed in. I have about 5# of wire through it. I have it all figured out. No brainer for the price.
customer_reviews.author: james Robert Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great welder
customer_reviews.text: Great welder! Super impressed, thought it wouldn't work that great but its fantastic. Not the same metal penetration as like an arc welder but you can still get a fairly nice bead. I got for my house cause I can just plug into a normal 120 us outlet.
customer_reviews.author: colin Dalton

customer_reviews.title: to chews the right manchaine
customer_reviews.text: I like it hold a 10lb roll but I wish it be lighter
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: unless you're a stubborn know it all like me). This seems like it would be a ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to welding and wanted to buy this as flux core is the cheapest way to start learning. It's simple to set up and within 5 minutes you can have it unpacked and welding. Since its my first welder I initially had a lot of splatter but it doesn't take long to start getting the beads to come out evenly (reading the manual helps, unless you're a stubborn know it all like me). This seems like it would be a pretty good machine for a hobbyist or a teenage kid who wants to start learning. I wouldn't mind getting another if something happens to it, and it's made in America.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You can not beat this welder for the money. 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing was better than I expected in every category. I just finished building a front bumper with this welder and it performed flawlessly the entire time. Produced great beads and welded 3/16 inch plate for hours without shutting off. Very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up and start using
customer_reviews.text: As it states. very easy to set up and start using! Really surprised by the power of this little unit too. about a month into using it. great product!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Practice first
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had much time to use it yet but so far it works great after quite a bit of practice.
customer_reviews.author: Cozmo B

customer_reviews.title: very nice welder, super great price
customer_reviews.text: very nice welder, super great price. The wire that comes with the unit is small in quantity and unraveled when I installed it, buy some Lincoln flux core for a better weld.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: My son got this for Christmas. He is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Moiraine43

customer_reviews.title: Really nice easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Love this welder. This is my 1st welder and 1st time welding anything ever. With a few hours practice i was able to build my kids a go kart with decent safe welds on 1x1 square tube with .125 wall i penetrated nicely. Had it checked out by a professional welder to make sure safe for kids he like the welds. So good to go. Very easy to use. I do advise getting the 10# spool of flux. The 2# with learning and fun welding it goes really fast. Hope this helps get others welding.
customer_reviews.author: MrRags

customer_reviews.title: Great welder!
customer_reviews.text: Love this welder. Extremely easy to use. The first thing I did with it was build step bars for my truck and I had no issues with it what so ever. The wire that it comes with is great. I ended up buying a roll of the same wire.
customer_reviews.author: Tanner English

customer_reviews.title: Didnt work.
customer_reviews.text: Didnt even work when my husband opened it on Christmas what a shame.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Bare

customer_reviews.title: So far, very nice
customer_reviews.text: So far, this is a great little welder. I'm no expert, but so far it's done what I needed it to. Havent got to the boat trailer yet, but I am sure with proper cleaning, settings, and effort, it will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Not a pro
customer_reviews.text: Wire feeds kinda spotty. Can't lay down a decent bead. But for figuring out what you're doing it's not bad
customer_reviews.author: Moriah R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent, cheap welder for up to 1/8" steel. Wouldn't trust my life to these welds though.
customer_reviews.author: Conrad

customer_reviews.title: Easy for the beginner
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I'm a beginner/novice welder. Just learning. Watched some YouTube videos and read welding for dummies. Really easy to use. Good quality. Great for the entry level welder
customer_reviews.author: stephanie rice

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a welder at this price point. ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for a welder at this price point. It works well off my 20amp circuit and does the job. Down sides are it only has two amperage settings "sheet metal" & "metal plate" which leads to the typical incorrectly set amperage issues with welding. Lots of reviews here say it will weld 1/4" plate but it won't. It doesn't get the penetration it should on material that thick.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron H.

customer_reviews.title: works like it should so far
customer_reviews.text: In expensive welder, works like it should so far, very light welding around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best 110 volt welder I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny! Best 110 volt welder I've ever had!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Great welder for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for what I use it for. It welds just about anything including stainless, but welds aren't as pretty.

customer_reviews.title: No problems - love
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks! My kids learned to weld with it and it is still going sting after many rolls of wire. No gas to worry about and portable. No problems - love it

customer_reviews.text: Very Fast Shipping. Comes with everything you will need to get started, except the mask. Easy to use, Great welder for a small price.

customer_reviews.text: beats the harbor freight model hands down. easy to use and lay down good beads with some practice. one great machine

customer_reviews.title: It was a bit bigger than I thought, but ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit bigger than I thought, but it gets the job done, in my case it got my exhaust system back together.
customer_reviews.author: ibuythingsonlinebecauseihavesocialanxiety

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to weld with. Experimented a little but was able to make nice welds on my forging projects

customer_reviews.title: Worked 4 days in a row
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Was nervous about buying such a low priced welder, but I used it 4 days in a row without any issues! Works good.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good but glitchy
customer_reviews.text: Very good little welder... But mine has a problem with the wire the motor will not hardly send the wire out even with no wire in the feed roller. When it does work it welds like a champ. In the process of sending this back and replacing with hopefully a better built one. Did notice that when I got the unit the front was broke and there is a circuit board lose inside. I would recommend for sure just need to watch there quality and assembly. Hope the next one works like it should.
customer_reviews.author: NG

customer_reviews.title: 125fc First welder, novice, needed it for some ...
customer_reviews.text: 125fc First welder, novice, needed it for some repairs on lawn equipment etc. Works well for my needs / projects. Used about 2 pounds of wire so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband bought this. He made our back porch with this machine. It's his go to tool every time he has a project. The price was great and I'm glad we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca

customer_reviews.title: Great for $150.00
customer_reviews.text: For $150.00 machine its very nice. Welds very good and light. Great for the hobby guy and great for in the field were you need portable light welding. I've been welding for 45 years buy this machine and not Harbour freight. Its well worth the extra money.

customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that the torch wrap tabs were not in the box. It arrived late but that was fine. Was not in a hurry.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great for the money. Takes a little play to get used to the speed and amp usage.
customer_reviews.author: mc in texas

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Product works great but I had to relearn to weld after using a Lincoln for so long.
customer_reviews.author: Denny D.

customer_reviews.title: Best inexpensive welder
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t much I can write here that hasn’t already been said in other reviews. Bottom line; if you’re looking for a good inexpensive welder or are looking to get into welding, this is an excellent choice and is miles better than any Habor Freight welder. There are limited settings but that also means less chance to pick the incorrect settings- very helpful if you’re a novice like me. It won’t do heavy duty welding, like a winch bumper, but I welded stainless exhaust pipe no problem, and it should handle most hobbyist level tasks. Buy an extra spoil of wire, the spool it comes with is very little and you will run out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave
